name: part_010
file: tmp_【 #さくらみこ3D新衣装 】ゲストあり！3D新衣装お披露目LIVE ⧸ New outfit LIVE【ホロライブ⧸さくらみこ】 [jYQdvWQ20O0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Sakura Miko performs the song "Senbonzakura" on a festival-themed stage.
MC section where Sakura Miko showcases the detachable parts of her new outfit and prepares for an announcement.

subtitles.original: 大胆不敵にハイカラ革命
subtitles.english: Fearless and daring, a high-collar revolution

subtitles.original: 磊々落々反戦国家
subtitles.english: Open and honest, an anti-war nation

subtitles.original: 日の丸印の二輪車転がし
subtitles.english: Rolling a bicycle with the Hinomaru mark

subtitles.original: 悪霊退散 ICBM
subtitles.english: Exorcising evil spirits, ICBM

subtitles.original: 環状線を走り抜けて
subtitles.english: Running through the loop line

subtitles.original: 東奔西走なんのその
subtitles.english: Running east and west, thinking nothing of it

subtitles.original: 少年少女戦国無双
subtitles.english: Boys and girls, peerless in the warring states

subtitles.original: 浮世のまにまに
subtitles.english: Going with the flow of the floating world

subtitles.original: 千本桜 夜に紛れ 君の声も届かないよ
subtitles.english:
Thousand cherry blossoms, fading into the night,
even your voice can't reach

subtitles.original: 此処は宴 鋼の檻 その断頭台で見下ろして
subtitles.english:
Here is a banquet, a steel cage,
look down from that guillotine

subtitles.original: 三千世界 常世の闇 嘆く唄も聞こえないよ
subtitles.english:
The entire universe, the darkness of the afterlife,
even the grieving song can't be heard

subtitles.original: 青藍の空 遥か彼方 その光線銃で打ち抜いて
subtitles.english:
Indigo sky, far in the distance,
shoot through it with that ray gun

subtitles.original: 百戦錬磨の見た目は将校
subtitles.english: Looking like an officer, a veteran of a hundred battles

subtitles.original: いったりきたりの花魁道中
subtitles.english: Coming and going, an oiran procession

subtitles.original: アイツもコイツも皆で集まれ 聖者の行進 ワン・ツー・三・四
subtitles.english:
Everyone, come together, the march of the saints,
one, two, three, four

subtitles.original: 禅定門を潜り抜けて
subtitles.english: Passing through the gate of meditation

subtitles.original: 安楽浄土厄払い
subtitles.english: Exorcising evil in the Land of Bliss

subtitles.original: きっと最後は大団円
subtitles.english: Surely the end will be a grand finale

subtitles.original: 拍手の合間に
subtitles.english: In the interval of applause

subtitles.original: 千本桜 夜に紛れ 君の声も届かないよ
subtitles.english:
Thousand cherry blossoms, fading into the night,
even your voice can't reach

subtitles.original: 此処は宴 鋼の檻 その断頭台で見下ろして
subtitles.english:
Here is a banquet, a steel cage,
look down from that guillotine

subtitles.original: 三千世界 常世の闇 嘆く唄も聞こえないよ
subtitles.english:
The entire universe, the darkness of the afterlife,
even the grieving song can't be heard

subtitles.original: 希望の丘 遥か彼方 その閃光弾を打ち上げろ
subtitles.english:
Hill of hope, far in the distance,
launch that flash grenade

subtitles.original: 環状線を走り抜けて
subtitles.english: Running through the loop line

subtitles.original: 東奔西走なんのその
subtitles.english: Running east and west, thinking nothing of it

subtitles.original: 少年少女戦国無双
subtitles.english: Boys and girls, peerless in the warring states

subtitles.original: 浮世のまにまに
subtitles.english: Going with the flow of the floating world

subtitles.original: 千本桜 夜に紛れ 君の声も届かないよ
subtitles.english:
Thousand cherry blossoms, fading into the night,
even your voice can't reach

subtitles.original: 此処は宴 鋼の檻 その断頭台を飛び降りて
subtitles.english:
Here is a banquet, a steel cage,
jump off that guillotine

subtitles.original: 千本桜 夜に紛れ 君が歌い 僕は踊る
subtitles.english:
Thousand cherry blossoms, fading into the night,
you sing and I dance

subtitles.original: 此処は宴 鋼の檻 さあ光線銃を撃ちまくれ
subtitles.english:
Here is a banquet, a steel cage,
now, fire that ray gun like crazy

subtitles.original: 希望の模索 遥か彼方 その戦場から打ちまくれ
subtitles.english:
Searching for hope, far in the distance,
fire away from that battlefield

subtitles.original: はーい！ということで！
subtitles.english: Yes! And so!

subtitles.original: いやぁ、みんな、どうでしたかにゃ？
subtitles.english: So, everyone, how was it, nya?

subtitles.original: みて！キャストオフできるんですにゃ！
subtitles.english: Look! I can cast off, nya!

subtitles.original: うわぁ、ありがとー！可愛いありがとー！
subtitles.english: Whoa, thank you! Thank you for saying I'm cute!

subtitles.original: あのね、ダンスがね、しやすいように、みこ、いつもこう袖とか、
subtitles.english:
You see, so that it's easy to dance,
Miko always has these sleeves and stuff,

subtitles.original: あったりとかするのに、結構ね、あの、大変だったりとかして、
subtitles.english: and it was actually quite, you know, difficult,

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、ダンスをしやすい感じで、袖もね、取れるようにしてみました。
subtitles.english:
so I made it so that it's easy to dance,
and the sleeves can be removed.

subtitles.original: していただきました！ありがとー！
subtitles.english: I had them made like this! Thank you!

subtitles.original: あとね、みて！リボンも取れるんだよ！
subtitles.english: Also, look! The ribbon can be removed too!

subtitles.original: あ、おケツ！
subtitles.english: Oh, my butt!

subtitles.original: おケツ、おケツですね！
subtitles.english: My butt, it's my butt!

subtitles.original: で、みてみて！しっぽ！ふわ、ぶら、ぶら！
subtitles.english: And look, look! My tail! Fluffy, swing, swing!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで！
subtitles.english: All right, and so!

subtitles.original: もうちょっとね、み、み、見せたいんですけど、
subtitles.english: I want to show you, m-m-more, but...

subtitles.original: 皆さん、あの、次でね、最後の曲になるんですよ。
subtitles.english: everyone, the next one will be the last song.

subtitles.original: その前に！
subtitles.english: Before that!

subtitles.original: みんな分かるよね？告知がありますので！
subtitles.english:
You all know what's coming, right?
There's an announcement!

subtitles.original: いいですか？告知させていただいて。
subtitles.english: Is it okay? May I make the announcement?

subtitles.original: それでは！じゃあ、告知、どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Then! Here is the announcement!
